price: Na kwamba ni Yeye ndiye anaye tosheleza na kukinaisha.
footnotes: Na Yeye ndiye anaye toa kinacho tosheleza, na akaridhisha kwa kinacho kinaisha na cha kuweka akiba.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
